content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_name
      operator: longer_than
      value: 8
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.2
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when variable name length is greater than 8.
Outcome:
  Message: Variable name length is greater than 8.
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Executability: Fully Executable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '2'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Variable Name (limited to 8 characters for compatibility
                  with the SAS v5 Transport format).
                Document: IG v3.1.1
                Section: 3.2.2
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '2'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Variable Name (limited to 8 characters for compatibility
                  with the SAS v5 Transport format).
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 3.2.2
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.0'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '2'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Variable Name (limited to 8 characters for compatibility
                  with the SAS v5 Transport format).
                Document: IG v3.0
                Section: 3.2.2
      - Name: SENDIG-DART
        Version: '1.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SEND Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '2'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The Variable Name (limited to 8 characters for compatibility
                  with the SAS v5 Transport format).
                Document: IG v1.1
                Section: 3.2.2

Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
